__e: You. You've got 40 seconds to run a patch for me.
I can hold my breath for two minutes, 40 seconds now. Do you want to try?
- It's my final word. I'll have lots to say to myself about mean old men who think only of themselves, and not at all of others who've served them loyally for forty years!
Forty years with no mission and they have to send it right this second?
I'm 40. It's not supposed to be like this.
There is honor in that. There's honor in takin' that 40-minute train ride... so those college kids could come in in the morning and their floors are clean. And their wastebaskets are empty.
If you put the pie in 40 minutes later... it'll be hot in time for dessert.
